org.ajax4jsf.io

Class SAXResponseWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • javax.faces.context.ResponseWriter
        • org.ajax4jsf.io.SAXResponseWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class SAXResponseWriter
extends javax.faces.context.ResponseWriter
    Author:
    shura

    Realization of Faces ResponseWriter for Cocoon Environment. Use ONLY Markup-specific calls , send it as SAX events to XMLConsumer Use "State" pattern for control of events flow. TODO - implement namespace capabilites
